  • Constructor Details

    • Parliament

      public Parliament()

  • Method Details

    • createLoksabha

      public void createLoksabha()
      Creates a LokSabha with a new Speaker. Prompts user for the Speaker's name and party affiliation.

    • createRasabha

      public void createRasabha()
      Creates a RajyaSabha with a new Chairman. Prompts user for the Chairman's name and party affiliation.

    • electPresident

      public void electPresident()
      Elects a President. Prompts user for the President's name.

    • addLokSabhaMembers

      public void addLokSabhaMembers()
      Adds a Member of Parliament.Parliament to the Lok Sabha. Prompts user for the member's name and party affiliation.

    • addRajyaSabhaMembers

      public void addRajyaSabhaMembers()
      Adds a Member of Parliament.Parliament to the Rajya Sabha. Prompts user for the member's name and party affiliation.

    • loksabhaPassBill

      public void loksabhaPassBill()
      Processes a bill through the Lok Sabha and Rajya Sabha. Prompts user for bill details and whether the bill should be passed by each house.

    • rajyasabhaPassBill

      public void rajyasabhaPassBill()
      Processes a bill through the Rajya Sabha and Lok Sabha. Prompts user for bill details and whether the bill should be passed by each house.

    • presidentPassBill

      public void presidentPassBill()
      Allows the President to pass a bill into law. Prompts user for the bill ID and determines if the bill can be passed.

    • displayLokSabha

      public void displayLokSabha()
      Displays the details of the Lok Sabha, including its Speaker and members.

    • displayRajyaSabha

      public void displayRajyaSabha()
      Displays the details of the Rajya Sabha, including its Chairman and members.

    • displayPresident

      public void displayPresident()
      Displays the details of the President.

    • displayBills

      public void displayBills()
      Displays the list of bills.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main method to run the Parliament.Parliament system. Provides a menu for the user to interact with the system.
      Parameters:
      args - Command line arguments (not used).
